EmailTemplate.name: New Contact at MBO (1349994964.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: New Contact at MBO (1349994964.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Dear Jim, I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. From this point on, I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. I received your contact information from Sarah Buckely (copied above.) Sara has brought me up to speed on your background and I understand you are looking to run a project through MBO with your current client but have a few questions about working out the bill rate. I will be reaching out to you via phone but if you would like to set up a time to chat you may go here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCfVBQp0V35feYAq7gnjzMNJunttYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to working with you! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> If you are in the DC area please check out our upcoming networking event! <http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e6cqaqtk0702919f&llr=kp5x6qkab> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
